attributes.action: Suspend Brexit until a referendum on the deal to be delivered is approved.
attributes.background: The 2016 referendum was unclear on what Brexit meant. The notion that the government is implementing the "will of the people" appears increasingly flawed. To resolve this we need a further referendum in which the people can express a view on the form of Brexit that the government will implement.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what sort of referendum you would like.

We have a number of open petitions calling for a referendum on EU membership. You might like to sign one of those instead.
